blastoise.name: Torrent
blastoise.desc: Increases Attack and Sp. Attack by 20% while at half HP or less.

blissey.name: Natural Cure
blissey.desc: Every 6 seconds Blissey will automatically cleanse themselves. Natural Cure will activate even if Blissey has no active debuffs.

charizard.name: Blaze
charizard.desc: Increases critical hit rate by 20% while at half HP or less.

cinderace.name: Blaze
cinderace.desc: When at half HP or less, critical-hit rate is increased by 10% and basic attack speed is increased by 20% for a short time. When hitting an enemy with a basic attack, a cinder is placed on that enemy for 5s. Boosted Attacks and moves apply 2 cinders. When the target receives it's 5th cinder, they will all be consumed to deal additional damage to the enemy.

cramorant.name: Gulp Missile
cramorant.desc:
When Cramorant has prey in its mouth, it will counterattack upon taking damage from an enemy.  Alternatively, Cramorant can shoot the prey at his enemy as a boosted basic attack. The prey bounces to 1 nearby enemy.

At high HP, caught prey will be Arrokuda, which deals damage to the enemy.  At low HP, the prey will be Pikachu which deals damage to the enemy and slows them.

crustle.name: Sturdy
crustle.desc: Gains 5 + (Level - 1) Defense and Sp. Defense for every 7% of Crustle's missing HP. Stacks 10 times.

decidueye.name: Long Reach
decidueye.desc: Deals 20% increased damage to distant enemies.

dragonite.name: Marvel Scale
dragonite.desc: Increases Defense by 100 when afflicted by a status condition (Dratini and Dragonair only).

dragonite.name: Multiscale
dragonite.desc: When damaged by an enemy player, gain a buff that reduces damage taken by 20% for 2.5 seconds. This ability has a 15 second cooldown.

eldegoss.name: Cotton Down
eldegoss.desc: When receiving a certain amount of damage, recover HP, deal revenge damage, and decrease the enemies movement speed for a short time.

garchomp.name: Rough Skin
garchomp.desc: When Garchomp takes a hit from a physical attack by a melee Pok√©mon, a portion of that damage is also dealt to the attacker. 2s cooldown and this damage is subject to defense reduction.

gardevoir.name: Synchronize
gardevoir.desc: When an enemy inflicts decreased movement speed or a damage-over-time effect on Gardevoir, movement speed reduction or damage is inflicted back to the attacker, respectively. This ability has a 9s cooldown after it's triggered.

gengar.name: Levitate
gengar.desc: Increases movement speed by 10% when out of combat for 7s.

greedent.name: Cheek Pouch
greedent.desc:
When Greedent eats a berry, recover HP after receiving the effects of the berry. At the same time, Greedent stashes an Oran berry in its tail. Being hit by a single attack or combination of attacks will cause an Oran berry to drop from Greedent's tail. Berries stay on the ground for 10s.

If any ally or enemy eats an Oran Berry, they heal for 45 + 2% max HP (unless the enemy is Greedent). Greedent enemies that eat an Oran Berry heal for 45 + 5 x (Level -1) + 2% max HP

greninja.name: Torrent
greninja.desc: While HP is at 50% or less, Attack is increased by 5% and movement speed is increased by 12%.

sylveon.name: Adaptability
sylveon.desc: Every time Eevee deals or receives damage, increase Sp. Attack by 5% for 1.5s, stacking up to 4 times.

sylveon.name: Pixilate
sylveon.desc: Every time Sylveon deals or receives damage, increase Sp. Atk and Sp. Defense by 2.5% for 1.5s, stacking up to 6 times.
